location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Catherine Frere, Wessil Lodge, Wimbledon to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter recounting Sir Bartle's reaction on hearing of Pelly's appointment in Baroda and relaying his thoughts on the difficult work ahead of Pelly.The letter also informs Pelly of William Edward Frere and his recent health problems as well as giving general news of the children.
